mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username=#{username} and status=1

SELECT id, NAME, CODE, STATUS FROM sys_role sr WHERE sr.STATUS = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT sur.role_id FROM sys_user_role sur INNER JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id WHERE su.id = #{userId} AND sr.id = sur.role_id )
SELECT user_id, username, nickname, avatar, gender, avatar, mobile, email FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND STATUS =1
